Name: LU 164 - Zoning, 1601 DeKalb Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 180148 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 180148 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 164).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Attachments.Name: Land Use Calendar - Week of July 16, 2018 - July 20, 2018

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - September 12, 2018

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on July 13, 2018 its decision dated July 11, 2018 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by 1601 DeKalb Avenue Owner, LLC,\expndtw-6  \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 13b, to change M1-1 and R6 zoning districts to R7A, R7A/C2-4, and R6B zoning districts on a portion of a block fronting on Wyckoff Avenue, Hart Street, and DeKalb Avenue, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the development of two new nine-story residential buildings containing a total of approximately 122 residential units, including 27 permanently affordable units under MIH Option 1 on the applicant\rquote s site (development site) at 1601 DeKalb Avenue (Block 3237, Lots 23, 47, and 48). (ULURP No. C 180148 ZMK), Community District 4,\cf1  \cf0\expndtw-4 Borough of Brooklyn \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 180149 ZRK (Pre. L.U. No. 165), \expndtw-4 a z\expndtw0 oning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\expndtw-4\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\expndtw0 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on July 17, 2018;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued February 12, 2018 (CEQR No. 18DCP061K), which includes an (E) designations to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous material, air quality and noise (E-465) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\f1\fs20\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\f0\fs24\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and \par
Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 180148 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission with the following modifications:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri70\sb70 Matter \ul underlined\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council; \line Matter \strike struck out\strike0  is deleted by the City Council;\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 13b: \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li140\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj 1.\tab changing from an R6 District to an R6B District property bounded by Hart Street, a line 400 feet northeasterly of Irving Avenue, DeKalb Avenue, and a line 350 feet northeasterly of Irving Avenue;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\ul\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj 2.\tab changing from an M1-1 District to an R6A District property bounded by Hart Street, a line 100 feet southwesterly of Wyckoff Avenue, Dekalb Avenue, and a line 500 feet northeasterly of Irving Avenue; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\ulnone\strike 2\ul\strike0 3\ulnone .\tab changing from an M1-1 District to an R7A District property bounded by Hart Street, \strike Wyckoff Avenue \ul\strike0 a line 500 feet northeasterly of Irving Avenue\ulnone , DeKalb Avenue, and a line 400 feet northeasterly of Irving Avenue; \strike and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\strike0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\strike 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District bounded by Hart Street, Wyckoff Avenue, DeKalb Avenue, and a line 100 feet southwesterly of Wyckoff Avenue; \par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\strike0\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f0 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated February 12, 2018, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-465, Community District 4, Borough of Brooklyn.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li140\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
